column4: imposed  and  the  cancellation  of the  driving  licence  by

column2: learned  Magistrate, I sentence the  Appellant to  6 months simple imprisonment.  Taking into
consideration  that  there  is  no  record  of previous  convictions  reported,  and  the  early  guilty
plea, I order the sentence of 6 months imprisonment to  be suspended for 5 years.

column3: Subject to  the above increase of the sentence, appeal  is  dismissed.

column4: JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
JUDGE OF THE COURT OF APPEAL
